about_the_game:
Salve! Pax Augusta is probably the most authentic ancient city-building simulation ever.

Many buildings have been recreated 1:1 and can still be visited today as ruins. Historians, archaeologists and many other active community members have supported the project with their expertise from the very beginning.

As the empire expands its borders, capable governors are sought to found new cities in order to consolidate the Roman claim to the newly conquered land. You build a small settlement along a newly constructed imperial road. You attract new inhabitants to the city by building a harbor and a forum. As your tax revenue increases, you begin to mine raw materials and construct new buildings to meet the needs of the population. Baths, theaters, gladiator schools, slave markets, etc. not only serve to keep your inhabitants entertained, but also to provide them with work. Import marble and other raw materials from distant regions and build monumental temples and palaces!

As a skillful governor, you will quickly catch the eye of the senate or the emperor. They will assign you new provinces to colonize. As you increase your private fortune, you will eventually be able to afford to become a senator. From then on, you will also become involved in political intrigues. Of course, you can also start your own intrigues, perhaps with enough money and power to reach the highest title: Emperor of Rome.

Will you always remain a poor governor or will you actually manage to become the most powerful man in the world? What awaits you in the game?

-Create your own Roman city with historically accurate buildings.
-The sandbox mode offers you complete freedom to build and design villages, settlements and even huge cities.
-Experience an exciting campaign in story mode - based on the historical writings of Tacitus.
-You must decisively counter fires, botched construction and uprisings among the population.
-Barbarian uprisings, locally stationed legions or wars in distant areas of the empire will have an impact on your strategy.
-Moody, benevolent or wasteful emperors will each have a strong influence on your life as governor.
-Huge maps - you colonize the northern borders of the empire - mainly the area of Gaul and Germania.

Become part of our community on Discord and shape the further course of development.
detailed_description:
We are live! Wish list now

Salve!

After so many months we are finally live on STEAM! We are quite excited to share with you this announcement and not only invite you to be part of our community but also to put PAX AUGUSTA on your Wishlist!

Please also feel free to join our Discord or Youtube channel to chat with us or find out more details about the game. You are also invited to our regular live streams on Youtube.

Thanks in advance for all your support!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6402P or AMD Ryzen 1300X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4 GB or AMD Radeon R9 380 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 11 compatible soundcard

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Pax Augusta is probably the most authentic ancient city-building simulation. Build flourishing cities and look after your citizens. Earn gold with production and trade of goods and build impressive monuments. Strengthen your influence and become a Roman emperor!
supported_languages:
English, German*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
